topic.para: &productname; comes with several sources of information and documentation, many of which are already integrated into your installed system.
To enter the Help of &gnome; or &libo; directly from an application, click the Help button or press F1 key. Both options take you directly to the application's documentation in the help center.
You can also start the Help of &gnome; by opening a terminal end entering yelp or from the main menu by clicking AppsHelp.
